tool_description: Tracks customer responses to review requests including review submissions, survey completions, and engagement actions.

campaign_id.description: Campaign identifier to track responses for

tracking_duration.description: Number of days to track responses (1-90)

error_messages: Invalid campaign ID: The provided campaign_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid tracking duration: tracking_duration must be between 1 and 90 days.
Response tracking service unavailable: Unable to connect to response tracking systems.
usage: Provide a campaign ID to track customer responses and measure the effectiveness of review requests over a specified period.

total_responses.description: Total number of customer responses received

response_rate.description: Percentage of customers who responded to the request

review_conversion_rate.description: Percentage of responses that resulted in reviews

response_timeline.description: Timeline of when responses were received
